Container.Name: unpackerr
Container.Description: Download extractor for Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr!
Container.Overview: RAR download extractor for Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr! Mount /downloads on all 3 or 4 containers to the same path on your host. This application will automatically poll all of the apps (Lidarr, Sonarr, Radarr) to check for downloads. When a completed download contains a rar file, this application will extract the file and move the extracted contents back into the download location. Files will be extracted recursively in an attempt to get all subtitles. [b]If you don't use one of Lidarr, Sonarr or Radarr, simply empty those two fields for that app and it wont be polled.[/b] If you put all your containers on the same custom bridge you may not need to expose any ports, and you can use DNS to reach other containers. It's a very convenient configuration!

Config.Name: Downloads Location
Config.Description: Container Path: /downloads - this must be the same path on this app and sonarr/radarr/lidarr!

Config.Name: Debug Log Output
Config.Description: UN_DEBUG - Turns on more logs. You should use this at least once so you know what it does.

Config.Name: Log File Path
Config.Description: UN_LOG_FILE - Logs will be written to this path if provided. Recommended, but required.

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: UN_SONARR_0_API_KEY - API Key - leave blank if not using Sonarr

Config.Name: Sonarr Download Path
Config.Description: UN_SONARR_0_PATH - Path to find Sonarr downloads. Must be within /downloads location (above)

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: UN_RADARR_0_API_KEY - API Key - leave blank if not using Radarr

Config.Name: Radarr Download Path
Config.Description: UN_RADARR_0_PATH - Path to find Radarr downloads. Must be within /downloads location (above)

Config.Name: Lidarr API Key
Config.Description: UN_LIDARR_0_API_KEY - API Key - leave blank if not using Lidarr

Config.Name: Global Timeout
Config.Description: UN_TIMEOUT - How long to wait for the apps to respond to API requests. Recommend 10-15s

Config.Name: Parallel Extractions
Config.Description: UN_PARALLEL - Most setups will not benefit from more than 1. Recommend 1

Config.Name: Polling Interval
Config.Description: UN_INTERVAL - How often to talk to Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr. Recommend 1-4m

Config.Name: Delete Delay
Config.Description: UN_DELETE_DELAY - How long to wait before deleting extracted files. Recommend 5-30m

Config.Name: Start Delay
Config.Description: UN_START_DELAY - How long to wait before extracting completed downloads. Recommend 1m for local and 5m+ for remote

Config.Name: Retry Delay
Config.Description: UN_RETRY_DELAY - How long to wait before retrying failed extractions. Recommend 5m
